#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#define maxn 1000100
#define LL long long
#define CLR(x) memset(x,0,sizeof(x))
using namespace std;
char a[maxn];
int main()
{
int n;
double num1,num2;
while(~scanf("%d",&n))
{
getchar();
scanf("%s",a);
scanf("%lf%lf",&num1,&num2);
int k=strlen(a);
double ans=0;
bool flag=1;
for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
{
if(a[i]=='L')ans-=num1;
else ans+=num1;
if(abs(ans)+0.5>num2)
flag=0;
}
puts((flag)?"YES":"NO");
}
}
